alert.note: Alert for Morrison; Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Todd and northwestern Morrison Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 713 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Staples Airport, or 28 miles west of Brainerd, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Motley around 730 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Crow Wing State Park. This includes U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 104 and 120. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
